title: Stassi Schroeder On Life After Cancellation, Being A New Mom, Vanderpump Rules, & Lessons Along The Way
itunes:title: Stassi Schroeder On Life After Cancellation, Being A New Mom, Vanderpump Rules, & Lessons Along The Way
description:
#463: Stassi Schroeder is a former star of reality show Vanderpump Rules, New York Times Bestselling Author, and new mom. If you haven’t listened to Stassi’s first episode with us, head back to episode #241 and see how her life has changed since January of 2020. Today we sit down with Stassi to discuss her journey with cancellation, and her life after reality TV. We also talk about how she lost the post-baby weight, the projects she has been working on, and if she would ever return to the reality tv world.

To connect with Lauryn Evarts click HERE

To connect with Michael Bosstick click HERE

Read More on The Skinny Confidential HERE

For Detailed Show Notes visit TSCPODCAST.COM

Produced by Dear Media
